author: Longomontanus, Christen Sørensen, 1562-1647
title: Christiani Severini Longomontani, ... Rotundi in plano, seu circuli, absoluta mensura, duobus libellis comprehensa, quorum prior veram constitutionem peripheriae circuli synthetice perficit, ... Posterior geodaesiam rotundi in plano analytice absolvit, hu
